modName: Undeath Immersive Lichdom Perma and Ordinator Perktree Patch
summary: I created this patch to be compatible with Perkus Maximus and Undeath Immersive Lichdom
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6][color=#ff0000]This mod is no longer supported.
[/color]
[/size][/b]
[size=3]This Is a simple Collection of Perk tree Compatibility patches For Immersive Lichdom[/size]



[size=3]This mod Requires[/size]

[list]
[*][size=3][url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/211720]Dawnguard[/url][/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/226880/]Dragonborn[/url][/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatability[/url]  (Before you ASK about Race Compatibility Immersive Lichdom REQUIRES Race Compatibility.)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40607/?]Undeath[/url][/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60783/?]Undeath Immersive Lichdom[/url][/size]
[/list][size=3]
and also The perk overhauls (Chose one)

[/size][list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]Perkus Maximus[/url] (only requires the Perkus Maximus Master.esp and  Perkus Maximus Mage.esp)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425/?]Ordinator[/url][/size]
[/list][size=3]
this patch should be loaded after any mods that change the same perk trees.
[/size]
author: TheBlackKnight3000
